document.full_text: alex rodriguez hit a tie-breaking, two-run single in the fifth inning, and freddy garcia pitched into the sixth inning to beat kansas city.
document.title: yankees 3, royals 1: at a crucial moment, rodriguez delivers for the yankees
lines_and_colors: alex rodriguez hit a tie-breaking, two-run single in the fifth inning, and freddy garcia pitched into the sixth inning to beat kansas city.
